info.title: IncentiView Indexer API
info.description:
The IncentiView Indexer API provides developers, analysts, and explorers with programmatic access to real-time data 
on the Incentiv Blockchain. IncentiView acts as the indexing and query layer for all on-chain activity, supporting 
operations such as retrieving blocks, transactions, user operations (Account Abstraction), assets, and account-level data. 

The API is organized around REST principles and is designed for use in dApps, analytics dashboards, wallets, and block explorers.

Each endpoint offers comprehensive filtering, pagination, and sorting capabilities to allow precise querying of blockchain state.

get.description:
Performs a global search across the Incentiv blockchain index. 
This endpoint enables querying of all major entity types such as addresses, blocks, transactions, user operations, and assets 
using a free-form query string.

Useful for implementing search bars or unified lookup features in dApps or explorers.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search term to lookup. Can include full or partial hashes, addresses, or INS-style names.

200.description: A list of matching search results across various entity types.

type.description: Type of the matched entity (e.g., block, transaction, userOperation)

id.description: Identifier or primary key (e.g., hash or address)

label.description: Human-readable label or summary of the entity

metadata.description: Additional metadata depending on the type

400.description: Bad Request. Likely missing the `query` parameter.
